About.paragraph: I am a fullstack developer with a decade of collaborative, client-facing experience helping large-scale tech companies find innovative solutions. I have a passion for design, a meticulous, user-centric approach, and am curious and constantly challenging myself to cultivate new skills.

Projects.description: Calling all hiking lovers! Keep track of all your favorite trails with this web-based trail tracking app.
